scripts.build: wp-scripts build && npm run minify-js && npm run minify-css && npm run copy-assets
scripts.minify-js: mkdir -p assets/js && for file in src/js/*.js; do uglifyjs "$file" -o "assets/js/$(basename "$file" .js).min.js"; done
scripts.minify-css: mkdir -p assets/css && for file in src/css/*.css; do cssnano "$file" "assets/css/$(basename "$file" .css).min.css"; done
scripts.copy-assets: cp node_modules/katex/dist/katex.min.css assets/css/ && cp node_modules/katex/dist/katex.min.js assets/js/ && cp node_modules/katex/dist/contrib/auto-render.min.js assets/js/ && cp node_modules/prismjs/themes/prism.css assets/css/ && cp node_modules/prismjs/prism.js assets/js/
